article.description: Micah Bradford had 13 points and six assists as Southern easily distanced Alabama A&M 67-46 on Monday night.
article.headline: Bradford sparks Southern to 67-46 win over Alabama A&M
article.linkText: Bradford sparks Southern to 67-46 win over Alabama A&M
article.story: BATON ROUGE, La. -- Micah Bradford had 13 points and six assists as Southern easily distanced Alabama A&M 67-46 on Monday night. Lamarcus Lee had 11 points and six rebounds for Southern (8-13, 5-3 Southwestern Athletic Conference), which earned its fifth straight victory. Darius Williams added eight rebounds. Cameron Alford had 11 points for the Bulldogs (5-13, 2-5), whose losing streak stretched to four games. Southern plays Alcorn State at home on Saturday. Alabama A&M takes on Texas Southern at home on Saturday. --- For more AP college basketball coverage: https://apnews.com/Collegebasketball and http://twitter.com/AP-Top25 --- This was generated by Automated Insights, http://www.automatedinsights.com/ap, using data from STATS LLC, https://www.stats.com
